summary: Provides a memory‑efficient way to divide a whole‑slide image into fixed‑size patches using a sliding‑window approach, supporting configurable offset, overlap, optional padding, custom filtering, device placement, and flexible reader backends.
business_intent: Facilitates scalable analysis of large pathology slides by extracting manageable image tiles on‑the‑fly, enabling downstream tasks such as classification, segmentation, or feature extraction without loading the entire slide into memory.
